Hi

Can anyone recommend some video capture software suitable for tutorial creation please? I've been asked a few times to run through wheel rigging in Unity as it seems to be a bit of a black art at the moment.

I use MSI Afterburner for KSP capture, but it only seems to support full 3D apps.

Cheers guys.
I've been using open broadcaster software for my quick & dirty videos. I haven't used it for voice overs yet but it looks promising in that regard.
